page.title: 10WARREN GRAVEL PIT
page.content: Owned by Bradwell Aggregates Mr.Argent is in charge and showed us around.Pit covers 50 acres of old and new workings.Six men work with Mr.Argent. Machinery includes trucks,tractors, bulldozers,dumpers and a 360 degree hydraulic excavator.Trucks carry 16 ton loads and 100-800 tons may move in one day.This sand is used by road and house builders and estate developers.Deliveries are direct to customers.360 degree excavators are diggers able to turn,shovel and arm through 360 degrees.Allowed to dig to 90 feet and licensed to pump thirty million gallons of water from Sandon Creek using 12-14 pumps.On site weigh bridge to check lorry and load.Pit suffers from motor-cycle vandals.When finished quarrying land must be restored to previous state by law.
